comments.author: Wolf Fivousix.4319
comments.body:
Hi Lawton,

Thank you very much for your answer, that solves the mystery, hehehe.
All those items were the Shadow Dyes, now they show properly in game too.

Happy programming!

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: In this particular case, /v2/items is lagging behind because we’ve added a manual verification step to the item whitelisting process. This is a (hopefully) temporary workaround until I figure out why items like this sometimes get whitelisted and how to prevent that from happening.

comments.author: Wolf Fivousix.4319
comments.body:
Hi! I am having trouble understanding how the items released in today’s update have buy orders, when they are not valid ID’s (don’t show on v2/items, but have listings orders on commerce/listings/XXXX).

For those items in the old times (like 31130), I know that we could place orders for items yet to be released and now despite being in the listings list they do not have buy/sell orders, but I thought that it had been fixed. So how can there be buying orders for items that does not exist in the game and have been released hours ago like 69231, 69451, 69469?

Thank you for the help,
Happy programming.
